title: Open Badges Version 2.1 IMS Candidate Final JSON Schema Binding (postProfile-200-400-401-404-405-responsepayload-schema)
description: Author-Alexander Hripak, Nate Otto, Justin Pitcher, and Chris Houston;  Version-2.1;  Release Date-August 29, 2019.

results.description: An array of Result objects. The array element types are defined by each endpoint.

ResultDType.description: An element of the results array in the ResponseEnvelope. May be an Open Badges 2.0 Assertion, Open Badges 2.0 Profile, or SignedBadge as defined in this specification.

id.description: Model Primitive Datatype = AnyURI. Unique IRI for the object.

type.description: JSON-LD type for the result. Must be one of Assertion, Profile, or SignedBadge.

error.description: Model Primitive Datatype = String. A nullable string and the human-readable message describing the problem.

statusCode.description: Model Primitive Datatype = Integer. The HTTP status code of the response.

statusText.description: A string matching one of the enumerated and allowed values for the given endpoint.
